mapper.insert: insert into tbl_requirement_feature_time_trace (REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID,REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_CREATE_TIME, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{requirementFeatureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requirementFeatureCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
